text: The Temptations Christmas Card is a 1970 Christmas album by The Temptations for the Gordy (Motown) label. The album was released on October 30, 1970. It's also the group's first holiday release, it features each Temptation leading on various popular Christmas standards and original Christmas songs. ==Track listing== Side One #"Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer" (lead singer: Eddie Kendricks; intro: Paul Williams, Dennis Edwards, Otis Williams, Melvin Franklin) 3:01 #"My Christmas Tree" (lead singer: Eddie Kendricks) 3:21 #"Santa Claus Is Coming to Town" (lead singer: Dennis Edwards) 3:26 #"Silent Night" (lead singer: Eddie Kendricks) 2:26 #"Someday at Christmas" (lead singer: Melvin Franklin) 3:27 Side Two #"White Christmas" (lead singers: Eddie Kendricks, Paul Williams, Dennis Edwards) 4:27 #"Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!"
